Reviews.Title: “Brand New, Great Location, Would Stay Again”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 8 days awesome perfect view space needle amazing hd flat panel tv free wifi nice layout considering hotels seattle price okay extra fee car parking reasonable found easy walk downtown concept hyatt similar aloft hotel self service check kiosks own breakfast bar modern hip cool lobby etc main improve breakfast included breakfast basically option fruit bread bagels cereal muffins toast nice eggs turkey bacon etc option pay issue checkin system didnt recognize gold passport chalk hotel systems properly configured stay rate
